text: @piersmorgan No piers, u need to wake up fast, u are scaremongering by leading with headlines like “ another person dies from Coronavirus “ etc, instead of stating facts & giving the correct information to the general public. It’s the elderly & vulnerable that are at fatal risk not joe public
